joinCompaniesCenter: Join companiescenter and connect with leading companies offering a wide range of services.
for_clients_paragraph: Work with the largest network of service providers and get things done from quick turnarounds to big transformations.
for_client_card1_title: Search a service with our filters enabled engine
for_client_card2_title: Browse a service and hire a company
for_client_card3_title: Get advice from a service expert
for_companies_paragraph: Meet clients you're excited to work with and take your career or business to new heights.
for_companies_point1: Discover opportunities for every phase of your business growth
for_companies_point2: Maintain control over budgets and timelines
for_companies_point3: Explore different engagement models to suit your needs
homeheader_subtitle: Your Trusted Platform for Connecting with Leading Companies. Whether you're looking to hire or get hired, we provide a comprehensive marketplace for businesses and job seekers.
whychooseus_network_description: Connect with top companies and professionals in various industries.
whychooseus_jobs_description: Find the best job opportunities that match your skills and interests.
whychooseus_trust_description: Read reviews and ratings from other users to make informed decisions.
uploadImagesHint: Upload up to 6 professional company images (.jpg or .png) that showcase your company. Ensure each image is under 10MB.
firstImageHint: The first image should be the company's logo or the most preferred image.
profilePictureBenefits: A profile picture helps build trust and credibility by allowing clients to recognize and connect with you, creating a more personalized and professional experience
profileUpdateFailed: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
chooseServicesDescription: Select up to {maxServices} specialized services that best represent your company's expertise.
selectionLimitReached: You've reached the maximum selection limit. Remove some services to add others.
pageone_heading: Join as a Client or Service Provider
pageone_client_option: I'm a Client, hiring for a project
pageone_company_option: I'm a Service Provider, ready to render my services

createService.title: Create and showcase your service globally
createService.description: Fill out the form below to create your service listing.

title.label: Title
title.description: Describe what the client will be hiring you for.

category.label: Service Category
category.description: Select a category so it's easy for clients to find your service.

location.label: Service Location
location.description: Where will you be providing this service?

description.label: Service Description
description.description: Briefly explain what sets you and your Service apart.

images.label: Service Image
images.description: Upload up to 3 images (.jpg or .png), up to 10MB each and less than 4,000 pixels, in width or height.
images.uploadText: Drag images here or Click to Upload

imagesInfo: Upload up to {maxImages} images (max {maxImageSize}MB each). Showcase your work with high-quality photos.
videosInfo: Upload up to {maxVideos} videos (max {maxVideoSize}MB each). Demonstrate your process or showcase examples.
serviceCreated: Service data has been created successfully
invalidImage: Please upload a valid image file (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WEBP)
fileTooLarge: Image size should be less than 5MB
error: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
title: Reviews
noUpdatesAvailable: No updates available for this service yet. Click the button to add new updates.
noProviderUpdates: No updates available for this provider.
